about_the_game:
Alcohol Empire - unusual mixture of real-time strategy and card game. Use a variety of cards and a range of buildings you can buy or build to gain an advantage and defeat your opponents! However, do not forget about time - the huge pace of the game will not allow you to think through your moves for a long time in advance, you will have to act quickly in order to keep up with your opponents.

Game Features:

  • Access to three characters with already prepared decks of cards. Let's skip the tedious part of deck building and jump right into the fight. We're here for fun!
  • Buy buildings belonging to other players, steal cards from them, strengthen your buildings or weaken enemy ones - everyone can find a strategy for themselves.
  • The high pace of the game will not let you get bored, and the victory will depend not only on the quality, but also on the speed of decision-making.
  • The original visual and sound design gives the game a unique charm.

name: Alcohol Empire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
